comments.body: I think those fixes are important and should go into 1.10 to avoid inconsistencies
The 1.10 branch will be re-created off master, so this should be fine.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +42,46 @@        op.alter_column('task_fail', 'execution_date', existing_type=mysql.TIMESTAMP(fsp=6), nullable=False)
        op.alter_column('xcom', 'execution_date', existing_type=mysql.TIMESTAMP(fsp=6), nullable=False)
        op.alter_column('xcom', 'timestamp', existing_type=mysql.TIMESTAMP(fsp=6), nullable=False)
